001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation.Ring;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.chain.FluentService;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.accordion.AccordionServiceImpl;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.alert.AlertServiceImpl;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.button.ButtonComponentType;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.button.ButtonService;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.button.ButtonServiceImpl;
010import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.checkbox.CheckboxComponentType;
011import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.checkbox.CheckboxServiceImpl;
012import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.input.InputComponentType;
013import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.input.InputService;
014import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.input.InputServiceImpl;
015import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.link.LinkComponentType;
016import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.link.LinkService;
017import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.link.LinkServiceImpl;
018import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.list.ItemListComponentType;
019import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.list.ItemListServiceImpl;
020import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.loader.LoaderServiceImpl;
021import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.modal.ModalServiceImpl;
022import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.radio.RadioComponentType;
023import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.radio.RadioServiceImpl;
024import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.select.SelectComponentType;
025import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.select.SelectServiceImpl;
026import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.tab.TabServiceImpl;
027import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.filters.TableFilter;
028import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.insertion.TableInsertion;
029import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.registry.TableServiceRegistry;
030import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.service.TableServiceImpl;
031import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.toggle.ToggleServiceImpl;
032import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.insertion.InsertionServiceRegistry;
033import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
034import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.InsertionServiceElementImpl;
035import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.tables.TableServiceFluent;
036import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.validator.UiTableValidator;
037import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.validator.UiTableValidatorImpl;
038import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.AssertionResult;
039import java.util.List;
040import java.util.function.Consumer;
041import lombok.Getter;
042import org.assertj.core.api.SoftAssertions;
043import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
044
045/**
046 * Provides a fluent interface for UI interactions, encapsulating various UI services
047 * such as buttons, inputs, checkboxes, tables, and more.
048 *
049 * <p>This class serves as a core service for UI automation and validation, allowing
050 * seamless interaction with UI components while maintaining fluent method chaining.
051 * It extends {@link FluentService}, integrating common UI operations.
052 *
053 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
054 */
055@Ring("UI")
056@Getter
057public class UiServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>> extends FluentService {
058
059   private InputServiceFluent<T> inputField;
060   private ButtonServiceFluent<T> buttonField;
061   private RadioServiceFluent<T> radioField;
062   private CheckboxServiceFluent<T> checkboxField;
063   private SelectServiceFluent<T> selectField;
064   private ListServiceFluent<T> listField;
065   private LoaderServiceFluent<T> loaderField;
066   private LinkServiceFluent<T> linkField;
067   private AlertServiceFluent<T> alertField;
068   private TabServiceFluent<T> tabField;
069   private ToggleServiceFluent<T> toggleField;
070   private ModalServiceFluent<T> modalField;
071   private AccordionServiceFluent<T> accordionField;
072   private TableServiceFluent<T> table;
073   private ValidationServiceFluent<T> validation;
074   private NavigationServiceFluent<T> navigation;
075   private SmartWebDriver driver;
076   private InterceptorServiceFluent<T> interceptor;
077   private InsertionServiceRegistry serviceRegistry;
078   private TableServiceRegistry tableServiceRegistry;
079   private InsertionServiceFluent<T> insertionService;
080
081   /**
082    * Constructs a new {@code UiServiceFluent} instance with the specified WebDriver.
083    *
084    * @param driver The {@link SmartWebDriver} instance used for UI interactions.
085    */
086   @Autowired
087   public UiServiceFluent(SmartWebDriver driver) {
088      this.driver = driver;
089   }
090
091   /**
092    * Executes a validation assertion.
093    *
094    * @param assertion The assertion to validate.
095    * @return The current instance of {@code UiServiceFluent} for method chaining.
096    */
097   @Override
098   public T validate(Runnable assertion) {
099      return (T) super.validate(assertion);
100   }
101
102   /**
103    * Executes a validation assertion using a soft assertion approach.
104    *
105    * @param assertion The assertion to validate with soft assertions.
106    * @return The current instance of {@code UiServiceFluent} for method chaining.
107    */
108   @Override
109   public T validate(Consumer<SoftAssertions> assertion) {
110      return (T) super.validate(assertion);
111   }
112
113   /**
114    * Initializes the necessary UI services and registers them for UI interactions.
115    * This method is automatically called after setup.
116    */
117   @Override
118   @SuppressWarnings("java:S3740")
119   protected void postQuestSetupInitialization() {
120      ButtonServiceImpl buttonService = new ButtonServiceImpl(driver);
121      LinkServiceImpl linkService = new LinkServiceImpl(driver);
122      buttonField = new ButtonServiceFluent(this, quest.getStorage(), buttonService, driver);
123      linkField = new LinkServiceFluent(this, quest.getStorage(), linkService, driver);
124      radioField = new RadioServiceFluent(this, quest.getStorage(), new RadioServiceImpl(driver), driver);
125      checkboxField = new CheckboxServiceFluent(this, quest.getStorage(), new CheckboxServiceImpl(driver), driver);
126      selectField = new SelectServiceFluent(this, quest.getStorage(), new SelectServiceImpl(driver), driver);
127      listField = new ListServiceFluent(this, quest.getStorage(), new ItemListServiceImpl(driver), driver);
128      loaderField = new LoaderServiceFluent(this, quest.getStorage(), new LoaderServiceImpl(driver), driver);
129      alertField = new AlertServiceFluent(this, quest.getStorage(), new AlertServiceImpl(driver), driver);
130      tabField = new TabServiceFluent(this, quest.getStorage(), new TabServiceImpl(driver), driver);
131      toggleField = new ToggleServiceFluent(this, quest.getStorage(), new ToggleServiceImpl(driver), driver);
132      modalField = new ModalServiceFluent(this, quest.getStorage(), new ModalServiceImpl(driver), driver);
133      accordionField = new AccordionServiceFluent(this, quest.getStorage(), new AccordionServiceImpl(driver), driver);
134      validation = new ValidationServiceFluent(this, driver);
135      navigation = new NavigationServiceFluent(this, driver);
136      interceptor = new InterceptorServiceFluent(this, quest.getStorage());
137      InputService inputService = new InputServiceImpl(driver);
138      inputField = new InputServiceFluent(this, quest.getStorage(), inputService, driver);
139      serviceRegistry = new InsertionServiceRegistry();
140      registerInsertionServices(inputService);
141      tableServiceRegistry = new TableServiceRegistry();
142      registerTableServices(inputService, buttonService, linkService);
143      UiTableValidator uiTableValidator = new UiTableValidatorImpl();
144      table =
145            new TableServiceFluent(this, quest.getStorage(),
146                  new TableServiceImpl(driver, tableServiceRegistry, uiTableValidator),
147                  driver);
148      insertionService = new InsertionServiceFluent(
149            new InsertionServiceElementImpl(serviceRegistry, driver), this,
150            quest.getStorage());
151   }
152
153   /**
154    * Registers insertion services for different UI components.
155    *
156    * @param inputService The input service to register.
157    */
158   private void registerInsertionServices(InputService inputService) {
159      serviceRegistry.registerService(RadioComponentType.class, radioField);
160      serviceRegistry.registerService(CheckboxComponentType.class, checkboxField);
161      serviceRegistry.registerService(SelectComponentType.class, selectField);
162      serviceRegistry.registerService(ItemListComponentType.class, listField);
163      serviceRegistry.registerService(InputComponentType.class, inputService);
164   }
165
166   /**
167    * Registers table services for different UI components.
168    *
169    * @param inputService  The input service to register.
170    * @param buttonService The button service to register.
171    * @param linkService   The link service to register.
172    */
173   private void registerTableServices(InputService inputService, ButtonService buttonService,
174                                      LinkService linkService) {
175      tableServiceRegistry.registerService(InputComponentType.class, (TableFilter) inputService);
176      tableServiceRegistry.registerService(InputComponentType.class, (TableInsertion) inputService);
177      tableServiceRegistry.registerService(ButtonComponentType.class, buttonService);
178      tableServiceRegistry.registerService(LinkComponentType.class, linkService);
179   }
180
181   /**
182    * Retrieves the {@link SmartWebDriver} instance used for UI interactions.
183    *
184    * @return The {@link SmartWebDriver} instance.
185    */
186   protected SmartWebDriver getDriver() {
187      return driver;
188   }
189
190   /**
191    * Executes validation assertions on a list of results.
192    *
193    * @param assertionResults The list of assertion results.
194    */
195   @Override
196   @SuppressWarnings("java:S1185")
197   protected void validation(List<AssertionResult<Object>> assertionResults) {
198      super.validation(assertionResults);
199   }
200
201}
